ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Anyone?
ygData.msgSnippet: That sounds like a great idea.  Let s all start a character on a single server, make it female and make an all-women guild. Two of us, Bev and I are on
ygData.messageBody:
That sounds like a great idea.  Let's all start a character on a single server, make it female and make an all-women guild.
Two of us, Bev and I are on Quellious.  IF we wanted to be really weird, we could all take the same last name, like a cult!  <G>
 

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 6/13/03 at Shanna Johnson wrote:
Anyone want to play eq together?  I'd be happy to make a character on whatever server for some female companionship and adventure.
 
Take care,
Shanna. 
Those who would give up essential liberty to purchase a little
temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety. 
 - Benjamin Franklin,  motto to Historical Review of Pennsylvania 

Muriel Hykes
